**Convertible Bond — Conversion Parity Price (Quiz-Utils Layout)**

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
set.seed(808)
bond_price  <- round(runif(1, 950, 1400), 2)
ratio       <- round(runif(1, 20, 40), 0)
parity_px   <- round(bond_price / ratio, 2)
cat(sprintf("A convertible bond trades at <b>$%1.2f</b> and can be converted into <b>%d</b> shares.", 
            bond_price, ratio))
```
